column4: Greendale Rd is shutdown to thru traffic between Leestown Rd and Mercer Rd until further notice.  A semi is on its side.
Motorists may use Westhampton Dr or Citation Blvd to access Mercer Rd from Leestown Rd.
Update 4:50 p.m. - The semi trailer has been offloaded.  Awaiting a tow truck for vehicle removal.
Richmond Rd at N Locust Hill Dr
column5: Malfunctioning traffic signals.  Police directing traffic.  Technicians on scene.
